question: What is the theme of World Day Against Child Labour 2017?
option1: In conflicts and disasters, protect children from child labour
option2: End child labour in supply chains - It's everyone's business!
option3: NO to child labour - YES to quality education
answer: In conflicts and disasters, protect children from child labour
explanation: The World Day Against Child Labour, which is held every year on June 12. The International Labour Organization (ILO) launched the World Day Against Child Labour in 2002 to focus attention on the global extent of child labour and the action and efforts needed to eliminate it. In conflicts and disasters, protect children from child labour is the main theme of 2017.
